Scientific Research

  • New York City's Real Estate & the Strength of a Name 22 May 2022

    Empirical study focusing on the causal analysis of the relationship between property sale prices and the location of a property, accounting for the majority of the advantages relating to a given borough, quantifying the value of a borough.

  • Tit-for-tat's Lack of Robustness Against Strategic Clients (Again) 19 May 2022

    Empirical study relying on a theoretical approach towards demonstrating tit-for-tat's lack of robustness against strategic clients-- simply, highlighting the differences between FairTorrent and BitTorrent.
